‘siyatha’ samanyadhikari mohan raj madawalasiyatha ef.em. rasika pa්rathichara dinagath guwan widuli nalika athara peramune sitina nawathama nalikawayi. 98.6 ef em tharanga mala osse mulu ratama aawaranaya keremin me wana wita sha්rawaka rasawindanaya udesa kudumahath mehewaraka yedeyi.sha්rawaka manasa pubuduwalamin me wana wita nawathama wada satahan kipayak da handunwa di atha.me pilibandawa ‘siyatha’ ef.em. samanyadhikari mohan raj madawala hamuwi thorathuru bindak kathabaha kirimata adahas kalemu.aarambhaye patanma ‘siyatha’ uthsaha kale wisiri pathiri sitina sha්rawakayin wenuwen kalinawa harawath yamak thilina karannayi.

mehidi ema shramaya ho nirmanathmaka dayakathwaya labadena manushyaya nosalaka harena athara, ee siyallata prathama yedawu pragdhanaya sandaha labena aarthika watinakama mulikawa salaka baleyi.mema aarthika ratawe goliya thathwaya matha wadath pidawata pathwanne pragdhanaya hinga parshawayan wana athara eya hudek sanwardhanaya wemin pawathina ratawal lesa laghu kala nohaka.
